welcome_message:
Welcome to the template for Lakeflow Declarative Pipelines!

Please answer the below to tailor your project to your preferences.
You can always change your mind and change your configuration in the databricks.yml file later.

Note that {{workspace_host}} is used for initialization
(see https://docs.databricks.com/dev-tools/cli/profiles.html for how to change your profile).

lakeflow_only.//: This property is set by default to adjust this template for Lakeflow Pipelines

project_name.pattern_match_failure_message: Name must consist of letters, numbers, and underscores.

include_job.//: For the present template, the answer here is always 'no'
include_job.description: Include a Lakeflow job that runs a notebook

include_pipeline.//: For the present template, the answer here is always 'yes'

include_python.//: For the present template, the answer here is always 'no'
include_python.description: Include a sample Python package that is built to a wheel file

serverless.//: For the present template, the answer here is always 'yes', since it can be easily changed

default_catalog.description: Default catalog for any tables created by this project{{if eq (default_catalog) ""}} (leave blank when not using Unity Catalog){{end}}

personal_schemas.description:
Use a personal schema for each user working on this project
(this is recommended, your personal schema will be '{{.default_catalog}}.{{short_name}}')
enum: no (advanced: I will customize the schema configuration later in databricks.yml)
